messages.title: ONLY BY VOTING FOR NICK DE BOIS CAN WE ACHIEVE THE CHANGE WE NEED.
messages.content: In just a few days you'll have the chance to vote in the most important general election for a generation. When you're standing in the polling booth with the pencil in your hand, think about the kind of country you want Britain to be.

issues.economy: If you want a country that has an economy that works for everyone where enterprise is rewarded, vote for change.
issues.governance: We urgently need to make these changes so that Britain can move forward. We cannot afford to wait any longer.

images.caption: David Cameron, Leader of the Conservative Party
